attributes.text: According to John chapter 6, Jesus went > where?
According to John chapter 6, who looked > up?
According to John chapter 6, which boy? >
attributes.answer: A boy with five small barley loaves and two small fish.

attributes.text: According to John chapter 6, surely > what?
attributes.answer: This is the Prophet who is to come into the world.

attributes.text: According to John chapter 6, knowing > what?
attributes.answer: That they intended to come and make him king by force.

attributes.text: According to John chapter 6 verse 21, > what shore?
attributes.answer: The shore where they were heading.

attributes.text: According to John chapter 6 verse 26, > I tell you what?
attributes.answer: You are looking for me, not because you saw the signs I performed but because you ate the loaves and had your fill.

attributes.text: According to John chapter 6 verse 40, > I will what?
attributes.answer: Raise them up at the last day.

attributes.text: On him God > the Father has placed what?
